name: Walk & Slash (AR)
description:
Walk & Slash is an Action-RPG with Augmented Reality scenes.

You must collect diamonds, and survive the attacks.

You can find treasure to become more powerful.

Walk...
-Walk in you real environment to find diamonds

... and Slash
-Look around with your device.
-Fight creatures that appear on the real world.
-You can also collect objects by clicking on treasures
